phrases.phrase: 그러고 싶지만 지금 그럴 여유가 없네요.
meanings: 의견 말하기 I'd love to, but I have my hands full at the moment.
실용회화-사내에서 Am I? I guess I am.
whether someone does something or not

meanings.meaning: now[when] one comes to think of it

vlive.korean: 그러고... and the next minute... 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 남녀 모두를 당황하게 한 한밤의 충격 고백!ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP12
그러고 보니 이제 팬라이브가 얼마 안 남았죠? Come to think of it, we don't have much time left until our Fan Live, right? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 연준이와 소통먹방
vlive.english: Come to think of it, we don't have much time left until our Fan Live, right?

vlive.korean: 아직도 그러고 산대? She still does that? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 혼자 남겨진 엄마의 진짜 속마음 [인서울] - EP.11
[그러고... 네가...] [Are you seriously...] View video 라면공작소 : [웹시트콤 오늘도 남현한 하루] EP.5 누나가 예능PD 꿈나무라면?
그러고 보니까 우리... Come to think of it... 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : EAT Jin

examples.korean: Come on! We don’t have all day! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어서 해! 하루 종일 그러고 있을 거야! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Come on! We don’t have all day! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You can take the car, if you want. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그러고 싶으면 그 차를 가져[타고] 가도 돼. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can take the car, if you want. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We’ll go for a walk if you feel like it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 그러고 싶으면 우리 산책을 나가도 돼. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’ll go for a walk if you feel like it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Come to think of it, he did mention seeing you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그러고 보니, 그가 당신을 만났다는 말을 했어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Come to think of it, he did mention seeing you. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’d be good to be there, but I’m not that fussed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 거기 가면 좋겠지, 하지만 난 그러고 싶지가 않아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’d be good to be there, but I’m not that fussed. Add to Wordbook
